summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4572 for the improvement of Lakeside Avenue from Alder Street to Yesler Way (produced); by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53365, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
